title: 21: Restructuring The Playoffs With Brian Windhorst
description: Brian Windhorst joins us in The Lab to discuss possible new NBA playoff seedings. We also answer listener All-Star questions, discuss Toronto's surprising bench play and more.
itunes:title: 21: Restructuring The Playoffs With Brian Windhorst
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
itunes:subtitle: Brian Windhorst joins us in The Lab to discuss possible new NBA playoff seedings. We also answer listener All-Star questions, discuss Toronto's surprising bench play and more.
